trans-unit.source: Obtains the file locations of Web services discovery documents for use in populating another Web services discovery document.
trans-unit.target: 取得 Web 服務探索文件的檔案位置，以用於填入另一個 Web 服務探索文件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocumentLinksPattern> class inherits from the abstract <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoverySearchPattern> class and is employed by the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryRequestHandler> class's <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryRequestHandler.ProcessRequest%2A> method, which handles an HTTP request for a discovery document.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocumentLinksPattern>類別繼承自抽象<xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoverySearchPattern>類別，並運用所<xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryRequestHandler>類別的<xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryRequestHandler.ProcessRequest%2A>方法，用來處理 HTTP 要求的探索文件。

trans-unit.source: Normally, none of these classes need to be used directly by a developer.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，任何類別需要由開發人員直接使用。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocumentLinksPattern" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocumentLinksPattern" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The file-system path of the discovery document.
trans-unit.target: 探索文件的檔案系統路徑。

trans-unit.source: Returns the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocumentReference" /> object for a given discovery document.
trans-unit.target: 傳回指定探索文件的 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocumentReference" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocumentReference" /> object that specifies the location of a .vsdisco file.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocumentReference" /> 物件，指定 .vsdisco 檔案的位置。

trans-unit.source: The concrete <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocumentReference> class inherits from the abstract <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryReference> class.

A <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocumentReference> instance contains the location of the .vsdisco file, which is also the file system directory corresponding to the HTTP request passed to the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryRequestHandler.ProcessRequest%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocumentReference>執行個體會包含.vsdisco 檔案，這也是檔案的位置對應至 HTTP 要求的系統目錄傳遞至<xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryRequestHandler.ProcessRequest%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets the file-name pattern to use as a search target.
trans-unit.target: 取得要當做搜尋目標使用的檔名模式。

trans-unit.source: The pattern "*.disco" indicates a Web services discovery document extension, .disco.
trans-unit.target: 此模式"*.disco"表示 Web 服務探索文件副檔名，.disco。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocumentSearchPattern> class, on the other hand, indicates a .vsdisco extension.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocumentSearchPattern>類別，相反地，表示.vsdisco 延伸模組。
